participant_1.background:
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can bowl in peace and quiet.
i like to eat.
I had to rebuild my comic book collection after it was stolen.
i own a pug , and he s the most loyal pet you ll ever have.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.

participant_2.background:
I like to make clothes and my spouse works in the music industry.
I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love.
i like watching action adventure movies and eating popcorn.
I don't own a car because I value my time and prefer to take public transportation or walk to restaurants.
i wear cardigans because i hope it makes me look more cultured.

content.text: Doing great! I'm working on my dream restaurant. How about you?
I'm doing well, I just finished rebuilding my comic book collection.
That's awesome! I love comics. Do you have a favorite?
I really like the X-men. I've been a fan since I was a kid.
I love the X-men too! My favorite is Wolverine.
He's a great character. I also like Storm.
Storm is awesome! She's so powerful.
I like that she's a strong female character.
Me too. She's a role model for a lot of people.
She is. I'm glad to see that there are more female superheroes these days.
Me too. It's important for kids to see strong female role models.
I agree. It's important for everyone to see strong role models, regardless of gender.
I agree. We need more positive role models in the world.
We do. I'm glad that we have comics like the X-men to show us that.
Me too. They're a great source of inspiration.
